en.title: Congratulations To Quantum Pendants Wearer, Karen Kong, On Being Featured In Time Magazine As The Artiste With The Biggest Following In Friendster With Over 150,000 Friends Linked To Her Page! FE Is So Proud Of You!

meta.description: Congratulations to QP wearer, Karen Kong, on being featured in Time Magazine as the artiste with the biggest following in Friendster with over 150,000 friends linked to her page! FE is so proud of you
meta.keyword: Congratulations to QP wearer, Karen Kong, on being featured in Time Magazine as the artiste with the biggest following in Friendster with over 150,000 friends linked to her page! FE is so proud of you
meta.author: klhunter

bm.title: FusionExcel Celebrates Presidential Directors Fellowship Banquet 03rd July 2009! (1)

meta.description: FE celebrated FE's Presidential Directors with a special Fellowship Banquet at Dewan Mutiara, Complex Mutiara, KL on 3rd July 2009. The title for the Cowbow and Western Banquet was Aim For Gold with around 150 participants comprising exclusively of PDs and their spouses. Many of FE's PDs travelled from afar to attend this exclusive event. There were speeches by FE's Founder CEO, Paul Ting and Founder Director KS Lee and sharings by FE's top PDs on how they made it to the top. It was truly inspiring to hear their success stories.
meta.keyword: Congratulations to QP wearer, Karen Kong, on being featured in Time Magazine as the artiste with the biggest following in Friendster with over 150,000 friends linked to her page! FE is so proud of you
meta.author: klhunter
